mapper.select:
select r.re_no, m.mem_name, r.re_content, r.re_date, r.no_no from notice_reply r join notice n on r.no_no = n.no_no join member m on r.mem_no= m.mem_no
where r.no_no = #{no_no} order by r.re_no desc
mapper.delete: /* reply -replyDelete */ delete from notice_reply where re_no = #{re_no}
mapper.select: /* Reply - replyCnt */ select count(re_no) from notice_reply where no_no = #{no_no}
